class_description:
Thrown to indicate a problem with time-zone configuration. This exception is used to indicate a problems with the configured
 time-zone rules.

params.param_description: the message to use for this exception, may be null

Methods.method_description: Constructs a new date-time exception with the specified message.

params.param_description: the message to use for this exception, may be null
the cause of the exception, may be null

Methods.method_description: Constructs a new date-time exception with the specified message and cause.
